library(teal.modules.general)

app <- teal::init(
  data = teal.data::teal_data(IRIS = iris),
  modules = teal::modules(
    teal.modules.general::tm_data_table("Data Explorer", datanames = "IRIS")
  )
) |>
  teal::add_landing_modal(
    title = "Welcome to the Data Explorer",
    content = "This application allows you to explore and analyze the iris dataset interactively.",
    footer = shiny::modalButton("Get Started")
  )

if (interactive()) {
  shiny::shinyApp(app$ui, app$server)
} else {
  return(shiny::shinyApp(app$ui, app$server))
}
